text: Keith Reginald Benson (1917-1990) was an Australian rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s. Benson was an ex Rugby Union first grade player and local athlete that swapped to Rugby League in 1940. He played many games in all grades for the St. George DRLFC but his career was affected by his service in World War II.World War 2 Nominal Roll. http://www.ww2roll.gov.au/Veteran.aspx?serviceId=A&veteranId;=211159 He was still in the lower grades in the mid-1940s, before retiring. Encyclopedia Of Rugby League Players by Whiticker/Hudson. 1993 Edition () Benson died on 18 December 1990. title: Keith Benson (rugby league)
